text: - Hey, I'm Mathieu. I'm CTO at Buildigo.

Buildigo is a Swiss
startup that helps people

find the right craftsmen for
their home improvement project.

So most of our customers
are based in Switzerland,

so the new region in Switzerland
is very important to us
because we can be closer to them.

So AWS helped us in two
major ways, I would say.

The first is our core
principle is being serverless.
We don't like to manage servers.

It's expensive, it takes
time, and it's hard to scale.

The second way AWS helps
us is with infrastructure.

We like to have our
infrastructure just like our code.

It has to be version controlled,
automatically tested,
and have auto completion in the ID.

And for that, the CDK,
the Cloud Development Kit,

really hits the spot
because our developers

can work in the same
language they're used to

to deploy clusters of
containers, to deploy S3 buckets,
to deploy any type of infrastructure
just like they used to work.
(upbeat music)
